reviewText: This is awesome & fun! Gene makes it fun & easy to understand! Love it!

Gene is a great teacher and very knowledgeable about Tai Chi.  Thank you for developing a video for the beginning student!  I appreciate your gentle and encouraging approach to this wonderful way to improve the human condition.
Gene has a gentle and humorful approach to teaching which immediately puts you at ease. He is quite knowledgeable and responsible in his teaching methods! 2 Thumbs Up !!!

It is obvious that the author of this DVD has found a niche audience: I, along with millions of other aging baby-boomers, know that regular exercise is essential to health and well-being, blah blah blah. But who wants to exercise when it hurts? Gene's approach actually makes it fun to try this technique. Hey, if billions of Chinese do it daily, and live very long lives, why not give it a try? Playing the Soul of Tai Chi
